Articles.Content:
I bought KSP some months ago, and after enjoying the game and this server posts, I think it is time to say hi and try to collaborate if I can.

I want to say that KSP it is amazing, I downloaded the demo after finding a video in youtube, and took me 15 minutes playing the demo to buy the full program, and now I own two versions, Steam and non Steam, I do now want to miss any update (and I keep Steam version vanilla, and the other version it is full of mods for testing crazy ideas)

That is all, we will see arrond here!
Welcome to the Forums. Glad to see you're enjoying the game.
